attributes.action: 15% discount to Energy sector workers on they're personal energy bills.
attributes.additional_details:
1. This will incentiveise all current workers in the industry to remain within the profession and increase positive moral.
2. It will incentiveize and appeal to all new recruits to train to become workers in the industry assuring the next generation.
3. This will assure a successful advance towards a UK national target of net zero.
attributes.background: Negotiate 15% discount to all energy sector workers personal energy bills from uk energy providers. This will only have positive effects on the energy sector as a whole. Wind Technician, O&G & Solar.

rejection.details: The Government isn't responsible for securing discounted access to goods and services for people working in particular industries.
